Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory132.png'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "...I see, t'was a really close call back there in the space station then. Mr. Watanabe, I thought you were going to ram right into that virus ball."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Same here. That was the plan too.', 4: '1'}
{3: "(It's still a bit early... But we've gotten enough rest, might as well set off.)"}
{3: 'At the train station, a group of people in windbreakers are sorting their belongings, unfazed by the Corrupted remains scattered on the ground.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Didn't expect you to contact me. You removed Hassen or something?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "If he's that easy, I'd be at the helm, not contacting you Forsakens here. You people are ready, I hope?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yeah. Just for the record, we aren't cooperating with you. We're only doing this because the Ascendants and the Corrupted are mankind's common enemies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hmph, call this whatever you like, as long as you pull your weight.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, how do we get to that "Kowloong" place? You gave us the coords, but we don\'t have any flyers left after the space station.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's why I had you rally here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ah, I see... You got Akdilek as well.', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Watanabe is trying to figure out Babylonia's agenda, a speeding train pulls into the station. Before it comes to a complete stop, two Constructs, Changyu and Sophia, jump off."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "...Huh. Y'know, we've been frequent trade partners, but this is my first time seeing the Forsaken boss in person. Nice to meetcha, old man.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm not your old man!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "Changyu, you have to hold your tongue like what Jamilah said. You'll hurt his feelings.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I apologize on behalf of my two bodyguards. They're not very good with words.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So that's how it is? Akdilek's in cahoots with Babylonia and getting all prickly about us Forsakens, all thanks to that little train rendezvous?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "T'was a diplomatic joke to lighten the mood. Surely you understand, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "A bunch of rotten schemers you all are... I said it before and I'll say it againâ€”you people should be rounded up and ruled with force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Then you'll have to redeploy some of your troops in Kowloong to keep us in place.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Hmph... Anyhow, if you'll excuse me, I still have to attend to my commander duties. Please hold up your end of the bargain and send reinforcements to Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Nikola... Quite the polar opposite of Hassen, hm? Interesting.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Well then, Mr. Watanabe, leader of the Forsaken, listen. All carriages starting from No.5 are yours to use. Since we're short-handed at the moment, you'll have to move the equipment by yourselves.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Is this another joke of yours? What's with the bunch of Corrupted on the back of the carriage?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Urgh!'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Ah. Must be the weather.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Well, since you have nothing better to do right now, could you help clean the carriage? You did hitch a ride after all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Sophia, Changyu, let's get back in the train.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Uh... what do we do now, Mr. Watanabe?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sigh, what else? Grab your stuff... Let's get cleaning!", 4: '1'}
